description:
Oil prices are hovering at around $50 a barrel, and it's hard to imagine that only six months ago oil was priced at double that. It's allowed many countries to cut domestic fuel subsidies for consumers, their voters, without too much of a political backlash. Malaysia and Indonesia are just two countries that have been slashing subsidies, subsidies that have guzzled billions of dollars from government coffers over the past decades. In a moment, we'll hear how other countries are also coping. But in the meantime, the World Bank has long advocated abolishing fuel subsidies in developing countries. John Baffes is a senior economist at the bank, so I asked him is it fair to say that fuel subsidies are now globally on the decline.

They are down a little in the last couple of years but they're still high. Just to give you an idea of the orders of money globally, fuel subsidies are in the order of $550 billion per year globally. And they have been going down the last couple of years, but only in the order of $10 or $20 billion, so they're still high more than half a trillion dollars basically.

title: 全球油价补贴下调（有声）

description:
《英乐天天唱》是一档模仿唱歌类节目，目的在于提升大家的英语口语能力。主持人会在每期节目中选取好听的歌曲片段，并给出发音提示和模仿示例。喜欢听音乐的童鞋可要积极参与哦！去沪江部落订阅本节目！

Traveling Light欧美歌曲，中文名称为《轻装前行》，发行时间为2002年。由Joel Hanson&Sara Groves演唱的乡村风格歌曲。
乔伊.汉森曾经是荣获过格莱美奖和基督摇滚音乐和平鸽奖(Dove Award)的美国福音乐队（PFR）的成员主唱和吉他手。在1997年PFR解体之后，他走上了单飞的音乐道路，但2000年PFR又重新组合起来，并且先后推出了《Captured》和《Broken》两张专辑。但是并未取得理想的效果，直到他与Sara Groves合作的一首单曲《Travelling Light》推出之后，才取得了轰动效果。
他可以说是一位多才的原创歌手，先后曾与音乐界Sara Groves, Geoff Moore, 和Phil Keaggy多位艺人合作过，其他还有过合作的乐队或歌手还有Mercy Me, Jason Gray, Phillips , Craig and Dean, Fusebox, Petra, Caitlyn Smith, Joe Rogness等…
目前乔伊.汉森在Joel Hanson乐队（作为PFR前身）工作，而他的哥哥Jade也是基督摇滚乐队Believable Picnic的主唱，可以说是一家双才…

      I was doubling over the load on my shoulders was a weight I carried with me everyday
　　我是加倍的重量压在我肩上是我每天都背负的重量
　　Crossing miles of frustrations and rivers a raging
　　穿越英里的挫折和河流汹涌
　　Picking up stones I found along the way
　　拾路旁的石头
　　I staggered and I stumbled down pathways of trouble I was
　　我步履蹒跚，跌跌撞撞的途径，我有麻烦
　　hauling those souvenirs of misery
　　把这些负重
　　And with each step taken my back was breaking Till I found the One who took it all from me
　　并且每走一步我打破了直到我发现了他把一切都向我

讲解：

模唱：

想要得到主持人专业的点评和意见吗？快来节目现场一试身手吧>>
